name: Missing Key Skills Case
description: Resume with significant skill gaps compared to job requirements

input.resume_text:
Jane Smith
Junior Developer

Experience:
Junior Developer at SmallCompany (2022-2024)
- Maintained legacy PHP applications
- Fixed bugs and performed minor updates
- Worked with MySQL database

Education:
Bachelor's in Computer Science (2022)

Skills:
PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
input.job_ad:
Senior Machine Learning Engineer

Requirements:
- 5+ years of software development experience
- Strong Python programming skills
- Deep understanding of machine learning algorithms
- Experience with TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar frameworks
- Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)
- Experience with distributed systems
- PhD or Master's in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
- Strong mathematical background in statistics and linear algebra
- Experience with big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop)
- Published research in ML conferences preferred

suggested_experiences.suggestion: Transition to Python development and build ML projects
suggested_experiences.implementation: Take online courses in Python and complete ML projects on Kaggle

suggested_experiences.suggestion: Pursue Master's degree in Machine Learning or Data Science
suggested_experiences.implementation: Apply to graduate programs with ML focus

suggested_experiences.suggestion: Gain cloud platform experience with AWS or GCP
suggested_experiences.implementation: Get certified in AWS or complete cloud-based projects

suggested_experiences.suggestion: Learn TensorFlow or PyTorch through hands-on projects
suggested_experiences.implementation: Build and deploy ML models using these frameworks

suggested_experiences.suggestion: Study statistics and linear algebra fundamentals
suggested_experiences.implementation: Take university courses or online specializations
